metadata.title: CVE-2021-3838 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
[Unknown description]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3838` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-dompdf - 0.6.2+dfsg-3ubuntu0.18.04.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: php-dompdf package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6.2+dfsg-3ubuntu0.18.04.1~esm1').
